body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Dealership Customer Service. My name is Gabriel Simmons. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hi, Gloria. How may I assist you today? Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five - seven three nine - two one six zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also confirm the spelling of your last name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information, Gloria. Is there anything else you would like to share about the service you received?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling disappointed with the customer service I experienced at the dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Gloria. Your feedback is important to us. We will do our best to address your concerns. Thank you for sharing your experience with us today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Gloria. Have a great day.
